mods.abstract: Typed invoice for an order placed by Ray Booker for 100 color window cards announcing the Dynamic Square Business Band with Freddie Waters. 50 of the posters are dated for the Homecoming Dance at Austin Peay State University on August 25 (this date is probably a typo and should be October 25). Receipt indicates agreed price, size, order quantity, shipping location and description. To view the poster for this order, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/28165.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
